Login.title: Login
Login.description: Enter your credentials to access the system
Login.noAccount: Don't have an account? Register here
Login.successDescription: Welcome to the Laboratory Loan Management System
Login.termsNotice: By logging in, you accept our

Privacy.title: Privacy policy
Privacy.introductionText: At LabLoanSystem, we value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website and use our services.
Privacy.collectText: We collect various types of information in connection with the services we offer, including: Personal Information: Name, email address, telephone number and other contact information. Payment Information: Credit card details, billing address and other payment information. Technical Information: IP address, browser type, pages visited and other usage information.
Privacy.informationText: The information we collect is used to:
Privacy.informationText3: Communicate with you about your account or transactions.
Privacy.informationText4: Send updates, offers and news about our products and services.
Privacy.informationText5: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations.
Privacy.shareText: We do not sell, trade or transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:
Privacy.shareText1: With service providers who assist us in the operation of our website and the provision of our services.
Privacy.shareText2: To comply with the law, enforce our policies, or protect our rights, property, or safety.
Privacy.shareText3: In the event of a merger, acquisition or sale of assets, where your information may be transferred as part of the business.
Privacy.secureText: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the protection of your personal information. We use SSL encryption and other security mechanisms to protect information transmitted online.
Privacy.changeText: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be notified through our website and the date of the last update will be modified at the top of this document.

TermsConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
TermsConditions.introductionText: Welcome to LabLoanSystem. By accessing and using our services, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
TermsConditions.acceptanceText: By using our services, you represent that you have the legal capacity to accept these Terms and Conditions.
TermsConditions.useOfServicesText: The services offered by LabLoanSystem are for legal purposes only. You agree not to use our services for any illegal or unauthorized activities.
TermsConditions.intellectualPropertyText: All intellectual property rights related to our services, including but not limited to trademarks, copyrights, and patents, are the property of LabLoanSystem.
TermsConditions.limitationOfLiabilityText: LabLoanSystem shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.
TermsConditions.changesToTermsText: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website.
TermsConditions.governingLawText: These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the country where LabLoanSystem is registered.
TermsConditions.contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please feel free to contact us through our contact form.

Register.title: User registration
Register.description: Enter your details to register and access the system
Register.successDescription: Welcome to the Laboratory Loan Management System

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.subtitle: Manage equipment loans and inventory in the laboratories.
Dashboard.recentLoansDescription: Latest equipment loans in the {lab} laboratory.
Dashboard.activeLoansDescription: List of all active equipment loans for the {lab} laboratory.
Dashboard.searchPlaceholder: Search equipment by name, category or ID...

Import.title: Import data
Import.subtitle: Import equipment or users from Excel files.
Import.cardDescription: Upload an Excel file (.xlsx) with inventory data for the selected laboratory.
Import.fileDescription: The file must have columns for Name, Description, Category, Quantity, etc.
Import.errorPartial: {count} equipment imported, but {errors} errors were found.
Import.errorNone: The import could not be completed.
Import.formatDescription: Your Excel file must have the following columns:
Import.note: If you do not specify 'Available Quantity', the value of 'Total Quantity' will be used automatically. Available quantity cannot be greater than total quantity.
Import.templateDownloadedDesc: The inventory template has been downloaded successfully
Import.templateDownloadErrorDesc: The template could not be downloaded

Inventory.title: Inventory Management
Inventory.subtitle: Manage equipment inventory for the {lab} laboratory.
Inventory.cardDescription: View, add, edit or delete equipment from inventory.

EditInventory.pageDescription: Modify the details of the selected equipment.
EditInventory.headerDescription: Modify the details of the selected equipment.
EditInventory.successDescription: The equipment data has been updated.
EditInventory.confirmLabChangeDescription: Are you sure you want to save this equipment in the laboratory "{lab}"?

NewInventory.pageDescription: Add a new equipment item to the selected laboratory's inventory.
NewInventory.headerDescription: Fill in the details to register a new equipment item in the inventory.
NewInventory.infoCardDescription: Enter the details of the new equipment.
NewInventory.successDescription: The new equipment has been registered in the inventory.
NewInventory.confirmLabChangeDescription: Are you sure you want to save this equipment in the laboratory "{lab}"?

Loans.pageDescription: Manage active loans for the {lab} laboratory.
Loans.headerDescription: Manage active loans for the {lab} laboratory.
Loans.activeLoansCardDescription: View and manage all current equipment loans.

LoansHistory.pageDescription: View all loans for the selected laboratory.
LoansHistory.headerDescription: View all loans for the selected laboratory.
LoansHistory.historyCardDescription: View all completed and active equipment loans.
LoansHistory.exportDetailedDesc: Includes all loans with complete equipment and date information.
LoansHistory.exportSummaryDesc: Statistics grouped by laboratory, status, and beneficiary type.
LoansHistory.exportSuccessDesc: The detailed loan history has been downloaded successfully
LoansHistory.exportSummarySuccessDesc: The statistical summary has been downloaded successfully

NewLoan.pageDescription: Register a new equipment loan for the selected laboratory.
NewLoan.headerDescription: Register a new equipment loan for a student or teacher.
NewLoan.successDescription: The loan with {count} equipment item(s) has been successfully registered and an email notification has been sent.
NewLoan.genericError: There was an error creating the loan
NewLoan.confirmLabChangeDescription: Are you sure you want to register this loan in the laboratory "{lab}"?
NewLoan.beneficiaryInfoDescription: Enter the details of the student or teacher who will receive the equipment.
NewLoan.emailDescription: A notification will be sent to this email when the loan is completed.
NewLoan.loanDetailsDescription: Select the equipment and specify the loan details.
NewLoan.equipmentDescription: Select one or more equipment items for this loan. You can adjust the quantities as needed.
NewLoan.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter additional details about this loan (optional)
NewLoan.returnDateDescription: Specify when all equipment is expected to be returned.
NewLoan.returnDateWarning: The date must be at least 5 minutes after the current time.
NewLoan.photoDescription: Take a photo of the delivered equipment as evidence.

validation.equipmentRequired: You must select at least one equipment item
validation.returnDateMinimum: The return date must be at least 5 minutes after the current time

NewLoan.emailWarningDescription: The loan was created successfully, but the email notification could not be sent.
NewLoan.selectionErrorDescription: The value of the selected equipment is invalid. Please try selecting again.
NewLoan.equipmentSelectionTitle: You must select at least one equipment item
NewLoan.equipmentSelectionDescription: Select one or more equipment items before registering the loan.

Profile.pageDescription: Manage your personal information and settings.
Profile.headerDescription: Manage your personal information and settings.
Profile.basicInfoCardDescription: Details about your account and personal data.
Profile.userManualCardDescription: Here is a user manual to help you use the site.
Profile.techManualCardDescription: Here is a technical manual to know what the site contains.

Validation.nameMin: Name must be at least 3 characters long
Validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters long

Settings.changePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure.
Settings.passwordUpdatedDescription: Your password has been successfully changed.
Settings.passwordErrorDescription: There was a problem changing your password

validation.newPasswordMinLength: New password must be at least 6 characters long
